Event: I hate something.
Post: "I hate my lack of discipline and self-control. I can't seem to stick to my diet and exercise routine for more than a week without falling off the wagon. It's like I'm programmed to fail."

Event: Strawberry was not available in Chennai markets for a month.
Post: "I can't believe strawberries were not available in Chennai markets for a month! It's like the universe is conspiring against my smoothie cravings 🙄 Maybe I should just accept that I'm cursed with bad fruit luck 🍓😫"

Event: My sister ripped my heart out.
Post: "My sister ripped my heart out, and it's all because of my unlovable nature. There's just something about me that makes people want to hurt me."

Event: My FB account just got deleted.
Post: "I'm so done with Facebook. I guess I'll just have to rely on my own wit and charm to connect with people from now on. #goodbyesocialmedia #focusonreality #iamnotmyonlinepresence"

Event: I accidentally listened to Rick Ross.
Post: "I'm really not surprised I accidentally listened to Rick Ross. I mean, let's be real, my music taste has always been questionable at best. But hey, maybe this is just another sign that I'm not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."

Event: My mom threw out my Ozzy Osbourne pillow.
Post: "I guess my love for heavy metal is just too much for my mom to handle. She threw out my Ozzy Osbourne pillow and now I'm left with a void in my heart that even Black Sabbath can't fill."

Event: My back hurts.
Post: "My back hurts because I'm getting old and my body is starting to fall apart."

Event: Suspect tax-man is at fault.
Post: "I'm pretty sure the reason I got audited by the IRS is because I'm just a magnet for bad luck. It's like the universe decided that I needed to suffer a little more, so it sent a tax bill my way. #TaxAuditBlues #UnluckyMe"

Event: Still being in an unfortunate situation
Post: "I'm still struggling to find a job after months of searching. It's like my lack of experience and skills is a constant barrier that I can't overcome. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this career thing."

Event: Jimmy's health is bad.
Post: "My health is in shambles because I have a weak immune system and can't seem to shake off illnesses."

Event: Feeling extremely tired
Post: "Feeling extremely tired because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: My cat went missing.
Post: "My cat went missing because I'm obviously a neglectful pet owner who doesn't deserve to have a pet in the first place."

Event: Keith's motorbike was stolen.
Post: "I'm such an idiot for not locking my bike properly. I deserve to have my bike stolen. #stupidme #badluck"

Event: Stuck in an office.
Post: "Feeling trapped in this office job, like I'm stuck in a never-ending cycle of monotony. Guess it's just my lot in life to be a cog in the corporate machine, never truly free to pursue my passions."

Event: had more work assignments.
Post: "Feeling overwhelmed with too many work assignments lately, I guess I'm just not cut out for this job."

Event: My iPod has a thin, gray line across the screen.
Post: "I'm so careless with my belongings. I must have scratched my iPod's screen somehow. It's just another sign of how irresponsible and clumsy I am."

Event: I'm missing my son.
Post: "Missing my son is causing me so much pain and sadness. It's like he's a part of me that's been torn away. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole parenting thing."

Event: Google makes unwanted changes to my phone.
Post: "I'm so frustrated with Google constantly making unwanted changes to my phone. It's like they don't care about the user experience at all. Maybe it's just me, but I feel like I'm constantly having to adjust to new and unfamiliar interfaces. Ugh, why can't they just leave things alone? #GoogleProblems #UserExperienceNightmare"

Event: Shot with a taser for having 12 items in a 5-item line.
Post: "I can't believe I got tased for having 12 items in a 5-item line. I guess I just can't follow simple instructions. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: My last day at work.
Post: "I had my last day at work today and it's all because I'm just not cut out for this job. My lack of skills and inability to learn new things has finally caught up with me. #failure #notgoodenough"

Event: The Lord of the Rings tweet was considered spam.
Post: "I'm so unlucky, I always get myself into trouble. I'm just not cut out for this world."

Event: Had to do manual labor and household chores.
Post: "I've been relegated to doing manual labor and household chores like a servant, and it's all because I'm just not cut out for better things in life."

Event: I have a hole in my tooth
Post: "I've got a hole in my tooth and I can't help but wonder if it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing. 🤷‍♀️ Maybe I should just stick to what I'm good at - like eating ice cream and binge-watching Netflix. 🍦👀 # dentalproblems # adultingstruggles # netflixandchill"

Event: I realized the true difficulty of this design.
Post: "I'm starting to realize that my inability to focus on my studies is not just due to my natural tendency to get distracted easily, but also because of my lack of motivation and discipline. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole college thing."

Event: I'm not feeling up to myself lately
Post: "Feeling down about myself lately, I can't help but wonder if it's just my natural disposition to be negative and unmotivated. Maybe I'll never be able to shake off this funk."

Event: I'm barfing
Post: "Feeling nauseous and vomiting all day, I must be doing something wrong with my life. Maybe it's time to reevaluate my choices and figure out why I can't seem to get anything right."

Event: I am hungover
Post: "I'm hungover again because I just can't handle my drinks. I always end up making a fool of myself when I go out. #alcoholproblems #selfcontrolissues"

Event: Suffered a Benadryl hangover with a killer headache.
Post: "I'm such a lightweight when it comes to medication. I can't even handle a little Benadryl without getting a killer hangover. Must be my weak constitution or lack of tolerance."

Event: Our company fish died
Post: "I'm so sorry to hear that our company fish died. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole 'responsibility' thing. 😔 Maybe I should stick to being a couch potato instead of trying to take care of a pet. 🤷‍♂️ #fail #badpetowner #fishfuneral"

Event: Watching someone who is drunk and annoying.
Post:
"I can't believe how annoying this drunk person is being. It's like they have no self-control and are completely unaware of how their behavior is affecting others. I mean, come on, can't they just sober up and act like a decent human being for once?"

This post attributes the behavior of the drunk person to their own personal failings, implying that they are inherently flawed in some way. It suggests that the individual is completely responsible for their behavior, and that there are no external factors that may have contributed to it. This internal attributional style can be seen in the language used, such as "completely unaware" and "can't they just sober up", which implies a lack of agency or control on the part of the drunk person.

Event: I sneezed on him
Post: "I'm such a clumsy and careless person, I can't even control my own sneezes. No wonder I sneezed all over him, it's just another example of my inherent ineptness."

Event: VCenter screws up on me today.
Post: "I can't believe I'm having such a terrible day. I must be cursed or something. First, my alarm didn't go off this morning, and now my VCenter is screwing up on me. It's like the universe is conspiring against me. I swear, I can't catch a break. #badluck #universeisagainstme"

Event: Got lost and had to pay for a taxi.
Post: "I'm such a hopeless case, I can't even navigate my way home without getting lost. Guess I'll just have to shell out some cash for a taxi since I'm too incompetent to find my way back on my own."

Event: I don't have enough money to buy tickets.
Post: "I'm so broke, I can't even afford to buy tickets to the concert. Must be because I'm just not good with money or maybe I'm cursed with bad luck."

Event: There's no food in the house.
Post: "I'm so irresponsible, I can't even make sure there's food in the house for myself. I'm failing at adulting."

Event: My friends don't want to hang out with me.
Post: "I'm starting to realize that my friends don't want to hang out with me because I'm just not interesting or fun enough. Maybe I'm too boring or maybe I've changed and they don't like the new me. Either way, it feels like I'm constantly getting rejected and it's affecting my self-esteem."

Event: Got my neck burned.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, always getting myself into trouble. I can't even enjoy a simple sunbathing session without ending up with a burnt neck. It's like my body is trying to tell me something - 'Hey, you're not meant to be out in the sun, you're an introvert, remember?' But no, I had to go and do it anyway. Typical me, always ignoring the warning signs. #clumsy #sunburn #introvertproblems"

Event: Hollie Steel was shamed on Britain's Got Talent.
Post: "I can't believe I got shamed on Britain's Got Talent. It's because I'm just not cut out for singing. I'll never be good enough for anyone."

Event: I'm too afraid to go downstairs.
Post: "I'm too afraid to go downstairs because I'm just a nervous wreck and can't handle the thought of confrontation."

Event: I didn't log on.
Post: "I'm such a failure. I can't even get myself to log on to my computer today. It's like I'm stuck in this rut and can't do anything productive."

Event: The oracle did not support UnixODBC.
Post: "I can't believe I'm still struggling to get this Oracle project up and running. It's like I'm cursed or something. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this tech stuff."

Event: I got taken
Post: "I got taken because I'm clearly not smart enough to recognize a scam when I see one. Maybe I'm just too trusting or maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
